sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REGULAR denotes any thing that is agreeable to the rules of art : thus we ſay, a regular building, verb, &c.

A regular figure, in geometry, is one whoſe ſides, and conſequently angles, are equal ; and a regular figure with three or four ſides is commonly termed an equilateral triangle or ſquare, as all others with more ſides are called regular polygons.

p.hi: Regular, in a monaſtery, a perſon who has taken the vows ; becaufe he is bound to obſerve the rules of the order he has embraced.
